Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Prohibits public employers from taking disciplinary action against public employees in certain cases
Summary: Prohibits public employers from dismissing or taking other disciplinary action against public employees if such employees are elected or appointed to represent the employee organization or its members or communicate or offer commentary on matters of public concern or matters affecting the employee organization or its members.
LawCode: Amd ยง75-b, Civ Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil service law, in relation to prohibiting public employers from taking disciplinary action against public employees in certain cases
